services.title: English Learning Services
services.subtitle: From beginner foundations to advanced fluency and IELTS mastery. Choose the perfect program to achieve your English learning goals.
services.beginnerDescription: Start your English journey with confidence. Perfect for complete beginners or those who need to strengthen their basics.
services.intermediateDescription: Build fluency and confidence in real-world communication. Perfect for students ready to take their English to the next level.
services.advancedDescription: Achieve native-like fluency and sophisticated communication skills. Perfect for academic and professional excellence.

testimonials.title: What My Students Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real success stories from students who achieved their English learning goals
testimonials.student1Quote: Aya helped me jump from IELTS 5.5 to 7.5 in just two months! Her teaching methods are incredibly effective.
testimonials.student2Quote: Clear explanations and fun lessons. My speaking confidence soared after just a few sessions with Aya.
testimonials.student3Quote: Professional, patient, and results-driven. Aya's structured approach helped me pass my business English certification.
